analysis.description:
Reentrancy in TokenVesting.release (/unique_chucks/7/0x5a1583c02dbbd6edd84abe6e5159497ee77b9a88.sol#371-380):
	External calls:
	- unreleased = releasableAmount(token) (/unique_chucks/7/0x5a1583c02dbbd6edd84abe6e5159497ee77b9a88.sol#371-372)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- released (/unique_chucks/7/0x5a1583c02dbbd6edd84abe6e5159497ee77b9a88.sol#374-375)

Reentrancy in MonthlyTokenVesting.release (/unique_chucks/7/0x5a1583c02dbbd6edd84abe6e5159497ee77b9a88.sol#449-457):
	External calls:
	- super.release(token) (/unique_chucks/7/0x5a1583c02dbbd6edd84abe6e5159497ee77b9a88.sol#454)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- previousTokenVesting (/unique_chucks/7/0x5a1583c02dbbd6edd84abe6e5159497ee77b9a88.sol#456-457)

Reentrancy in TokenVesting.revoke (/unique_chucks/7/0x5a1583c02dbbd6edd84abe6e5159497ee77b9a88.sol#391-400):
	External calls:
	- balance = token.balanceOf(this) (/unique_chucks/7/0x5a1583c02dbbd6edd84abe6e5159497ee77b9a88.sol#394)
	- unreleased = releasableAmount(token) (/unique_chucks/7/0x5a1583c02dbbd6edd84abe6e5159497ee77b9a88.sol#394-395)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- revoked (/unique_chucks/7/0x5a1583c02dbbd6edd84abe6e5159497ee77b9a88.sol#399)

Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/7/0x5a1583c02dbbd6edd84abe6e5159497ee77b9a88.sol#714-731) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/7/0x5a1583c02dbbd6edd84abe6e5159497ee77b9a88.sol#728-729)

Tokensale.mintInvestmentFundAndMiscellaneous (/unique_chucks/7/0x5a1583c02dbbd6edd84abe6e5159497ee77b9a88.sol#920-929) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(_investmentFundWallet,INVESTMENT_FUND_TOKENS_SUPPLY) (/unique_chucks/7/0x5a1583c02dbbd6edd84abe6e5159497ee77b9a88.sol#925-928)
	-token.mint(_miscellaneousWallet,MISCELLANEOUS_TOKENS_SUPPLY) (/unique_chucks/7/0x5a1583c02dbbd6edd84abe6e5159497ee77b9a88.sol#928-929)

Reentrancy in Tokensale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/7/0x5a1583c02dbbd6edd84abe6e5159497ee77b9a88.sol#906-916):
	External calls:
	- super.buyTokens(beneficiary) (/unique_chucks/7/0x5a1583c02dbbd6edd84abe6e5159497ee77b9a88.sol#910)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- presaleLimit (/unique_chucks/7/0x5a1583c02dbbd6edd84abe6e5159497ee77b9a88.sol#912-913)
	- totalSold (/unique_chucks/7/0x5a1583c02dbbd6edd84abe6e5159497ee77b9a88.sol#913-916)
